channel.title: culture on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in culture on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Culture Test
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This is the culture test for Dwarves, developed as we face the challenges of the late 2024 market. The goal is simple: to focus on what matters most—our cultural values.

item.title: The Manifesto
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Aim for Quality Quality exists in every piece of work. We thrive to deliver the best because we can.

item.title: OGIF - Oh God It's Friday
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: OGIF, or ‘Oh God It’s Friday,’ is our team’s weekly technical deep-dive. It’s a dedicated time for engineers to present complex problems, discuss potential solutions, and explore emerging technologies relevant to our work.

item.title: Growth Is Our Universal Language
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves, the core team live and breathe growth. We believe that growth is our universal language, and we’re always striving to improve ourselves, both personally and professionally.

item.title: OGIF - Oh God It's Friday
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I would like to introduce to you our new initiative called OGIF — Oh God It’s Friday. Moving forward, our Friday Showcase will have a broader range of topics to discuss and share.

item.title: The Inner Circle
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The concept of an “inner circle” within a company is not a new one, and at Dwarves, a software company founded by a group of engineers, this idea holds a significant value.

item.title: Sharing knowledge
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves Foundation, sharing is fundamental to our culture. We share frequently through public events, many of which are recorded for wider learning.

item.title: The Dwarves Culture Handbook
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: For the past 5 years, we didn’t have something called ‘Culture Book’. Whenever a newbie steps in, it’s natural to pick up the job and go with the flow.

item.title: What we value
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Values come first. They guide our decisions, shape our culture, and define who we are as a company. They’re what we’re proud of and what helps us navigate difficult choices.

item.title: You are Dwarves Foundation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: You are our voice When you join Dwarves Foundation, you become our voice to the world. Every interaction matters. When Quang responds to a support request, he isn’t just Quang, he is Dwarves Foundation.
